content.detailedDescription: I attached a drawing of the enormous object in question from yesterday. sorry for the delay.
content.summary: This is in regard of the same sighting i reported yesterday

content.detailedDescription: Saturday morning, i went outside to water my plants. i looked up in the sky and seen like a blurry white orb hovering around, i watched it for about 2 minutes and it disappeared. a few minutes later i looked up again and there it was closer to be and looked like a floating star hovering around. i got my camera immediately and snapped a photo. then it suddenly changed its path and made a sharp turn north. i live a few blocks south of the lake so im sure it headed over the lake. it disappeared from that point.
content.summary: Flying star like object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were having a late night cigarette a d i noticed a star that appeared to be moving i asked my nd to come over to my side of the truck were i was sitting at to get a better look and he said do you see this? i looked over at this star like object which he was talking about and saw it shoot straight up then back down then left and right realizing this was not a plane nor a satellite. this lasted over a half hour. then about 20 minutes into watching a second light which flashed quickly like an airplane dropped in our of nowhere right above the trendline much closer than the first one moving rapidly up and down the tree line to the top n bottom of the trees but never appearing to touch ground. last night august 2nd again we were having a cigarette by my truck when another flash came first the trees the first flash was red and caught my attention. but then it flashed black-and-white like the last time and i thought to myself oh it's a plane . my boyfriend saw one flash n heard me say it's just a plane n looked away however when it flashed again white but all the way to the end of the tree line i realized it was too fast for a plane and in that moment it now flashed back to the middle of the trees it had changed directions super fast so i knew it was the same thing from last week.I got back in my truck and my bc came to my window as we discussed what i saw. all of a sudden i heard a loud knocking on my passenger window and it was completely black out . i was completely freaked out n did not turn to see what it was but my be could not see it anyways. i asked him should i lock it but i think he was freaked out to. just lasted about 30 seconds then stopped. it did have a hum noise as if my window lock was being pushed. we finally looked n saw nothing. we decided it was a good idea to go in for the night.
content.summary: Star like object moved in all directions and hovered over tree tops then a fast moving flash came closer

content.detailedDescription: Around 5 years ago, myself and about 5 other people were at the mann 9 shopping center in granada hills, california. it was early in the morning, around 2 am and we were all just hanging out, laughing, having a good time. all of a sudden in the distance, a bright pulsating star like object shoots up from the ground and into the sky at an astounding speed. it went in a diagonal line, with no change in direction. as it shot to the sky, we watched it as it went farther and farther and eventually faded from view. we were astonished at the time but we quickly dismissed it as a satellite or some sort of man made thing. the next morning i looked for any satellite launches that occurred and could find nothing. years passed and i dismissed the event, going on with my life. however, some friends and i were discussing the ufo phenomenon and sharing our sightings when i started to think about this again. the fact there was no thrust or trail or sound made me want to share this with you. as i am an economics and political science major i have no aeronautical engineering knowledge and i'd like to submit this sighting with you for you guys to confirm my belief that it was a satellite, as that is what i thought it was. even though this was a long time ago, i remember it clearly, wasn't inebriated at the time, and there were other witnesses. feel free to contact me for more information. i want to believe!!
content.summary: Bright pulsating star like object shot from the ground into space at astounding speed, with no noise or thrust trail.

content.detailedDescription: Saw steady, non-strobing (and thus could not be any faa regulated aircraft), very fast white light move across the sky from the horizon in the west to the horizon in the south in a matter of 4 minutes or less. it was completely silent. it moved in a straight line path without wavering, although it did stop abruptly at one point for about 2 or 3 seconds and then continued on the same course at the same speed that it had been prior to halting. i viewed the anomaly both with my naked eye and through my celestron 15x70 binoculars although i could not make out any shape other than the typical spherical glow given off by any standard bulbous light source. my girlfriend saw it too.
content.summary: saw steady, non-strobing, very fast, silent lighted object travel across the entire length of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was early morning and clear. no clouds were visible. i was up because i couldn't sleep and went out on my deck to get some air. as always i looked up to see the stars. i saw a white light moving high in the sky from the nw and thought it was an aircraft. as it got closer i noticed no flashing beacons, no running lights and no noise. the shape was a triangle and there was a bright white light on each corner. it few from nw to se along a straight line and rotated counter clockwise as it flew. the entire sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds. i could not determine the altitude or speed but will guess at approximately 500ft. after the sighting my first thought was of my camera on the counter but if i had gone in to get it i would have missed it. the object went behind the trees in my yard and that is when i lost sight of it. this is not my first sighting but it is the first i have reported. (previous sighting i will discuss but only in person, not on line or over the phone). as a side note i am retired from the us navy having spent 22 years in naval aviation and this was not an aircraft or anything in our inventory.
content.summary: Triangle with a white light at each corner rotating counter clockwise along a straight path.

content.detailedDescription: Saw first light and at first thought it to be a reflection on a plastic wind break on the deck. i left the deck to get a better look and followed the object from horizon to horizon as best as the trees would let me see. i strained to hear any engine sound but heard none. after the object became obscured by the trees i made sure to verify the conditions and time, the sky was overcast. i tried to did miss what i had seen while observing the weather condition and saw the same color and size objected following the same course speed and heading.  i followed the second object until it was obscured by the trees and listing for some type of engine sound but heard nothing. i don't think it makes a difference on my sighting but we were experiencing a partial power outage at the time.
content.summary: Orange silent movied west to east followed by a second sighting on same path

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:30 pm a lot of air traffic was sent in our direction from the msp airport. this was unusual, so i was watching the planes fly across the sky. one plane caught my attention when it appeared to not move across the sky, or not move much rather. i didn't notice it coming or going, it just happened to be present when i looked to the nw. for how large it appeared, i must assume that it was only about a mile away, so i felt compelled to watch it until it made some sense to me. it had three white blinking lights evenly spaced in a row across the back. it took about a minute before i realized that it was moving, just incredibly slow. from what i could gather, it appeared to be flying at a speed less than thirty miles per hour. and so i gave my dad a call who happens to live about two miles in that direction. he answered but was at the county fair watching the truck pulling contest. somehow the story about the lazy airplane didn't come up. 
 
about five minutes later, i was now on my deck and still talking with him when i saw the orange light apparently pop up out of nowhere. this was now directly south and about fifteen degrees above the horizon. i was watching it for about ten seconds, it appeared to kind of bounce around before the light started to move east. 

i said, dad there's an orange light sort of bouncing around... now it's moving across the sky, look to your west. can you see it? as soon as i finished my sentence the light simply shut off. it just vanished like somebody just shut it off. 

then i hear him say, 'okay, looking west, i can't see it'. now i'm explaining why he can't see it because the light just shut off, then light simply turned back on but stationary, and very dim. 

wait, it's back on now, are you looking?
west? he said. 
yeah west... wait or south now, it's getting dimmer, it's moving south now... and... it's... gone. 


all i see is the parking lot, he said.

lol, anyhow, how's the fair?
content.summary: Orange orb southern lake elmo ... possibly north woodbury

content.detailedDescription:
After i parked my car i was looking in the southwestern sky to see if i could view the blue star kachina.  i spotted the blinking lights which were at a high altitude and noticed that it couldn't be a jet because there was no movement.  then it started darting in all directions, but staying within a specific confined area of the sky.

after 10 minutes i got on my home computer hoping to find a las vegas mufon person to contact by phone to report this and have them also witness this.

no such local number exists.  when i called the toll-free number it directed me to fill this report.  i'm going back outside now to see if it's still there.

russell kupfrian
content.summary: A flickering star like object that darted around, but stayed in one specific area.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were in the backyard with a fire and witnessed an orange light moving steadily from approximately north to south. the light was relatively solid but pulsated a little bit. there was no sound. the light moved very quickly and was quite large so it appeared to be traveling at a pretty low altitude. we were unable to make out any structure of the object except for the orange circular light. there were no other lights on the object itself that were visible.

we thought it was a hospital helicopter or something. then one or two minutes later, a second object of the same description flew overhead along the same approximate flight path. a total of six of these objects flew overhead over a time period of less than a half hour.

the only thing i could think of is that these are some kind of military helicopters, but why no sound? i was under the impression that helicopters had multiple white and red lights typically as well.

my dad took some pictures and video with his phone, i will try and obtain them from him to add to this report.
content.summary: 6 orange lights moving along the same flight path about a minute or two apart from each other

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside and saw a very bright light which initially appeared stationary in the sky. after looking at the object for a few seconds, i could see it was moving very slowly. it was a very bright yellow-orange color. i watched the light travel on a slow straight course for about two minutes and it appeared to get closer to me. as it got closer, i saw tiny white lights pulsate a few times. then the light went behind my house and i could no longer see it due to trees.
content.summary: Bright yellow/orange, slowly moving light

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and our 2 year old were sitting in our back yard having a fire this evening. it was about 10 20 or so when our baby started pointing at the sky and saying pretty. we both turned and had the same reaction as we witnessed to bright orange objects passing over the tree line in the sky. we kept watching and then there was another bright orange object that joined them. they were in a triangle formation and headed east past the tree line where we could not see them. this continued over the next 20 min as more of these strange crafts appeared in groups of threes. we watched two of them hover for a few minuets. one of them stopped dead in its tracks and then went straight up in the sky and we watched as a third craft joined them, they made the triangular formation and continued on. we counted 18 total crafts tonight and it has been about 40 min since we saw the last three crafts. this was the wildest experience we have ever witnessed. i have seen many strange lights in the sky and am a true believer in extra terestrials. however i have never seen anything like what i saw tonight . one thing that i cant get out of my mind was the overwhelming calming sensation i felt as i watched these crafts in the sky. it was like i wanted to be afraid or nervous but something in my mind kept me extremely calm during this event. i wish i could have watched them longer or seen where they were going but they flew below the tree line as though all 18 craft were headed to the same destination.
content.summary: Bright orange ufo with pulsating red light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i counted a total of 5 objects traveling overhead at various intervals over approximately a 5 minute period.  we had just returned home from walking our dog.  all were traveling in a straight line east, taking 20-30 seconds to go from overhead to the horizon.

they were vaguely round amber lights. all identical.  no shape was discernible.  i had a good pair of binoculars and followed #5 for nearly 30 seconds without being able to make out a source of this light or any recognizable shape of the light.  the lights did not flash or blink, and we heard nothing but the crickets.  they sometimes flickered near the horizon as they went through cloud cover.

the first two flew very close to each other.  in fact, our impression was that they were the leading and tailing light of an airplane, since the second flowed closely behind the first (though as i said the color was wrong, and they were not blinking).  we were left perplexed, because while the speed and brightness suggested a low-flying aircraft, we should have heard it at that height.  

the other three lights were distinctly singular.  they did not apparently follow the same exact flight path as the first two, but did fly west to east.  the third came less than a minute later.  the last 2 came separately  2 or 3 minutes later.  all flew at a fairly uniform, constant speed.

it was night, but no stars were visible because of clouds.  the source of the light was not very diffuse, so it may have been near the bottom edge of the clouds.

i am a visiting professor of sociology at a large university.  my wife works at a bank.  we and i are birders, so we recognize many of the ways people���s impression and memory of objects can be confused.  we have practiced methods we use to accurately describe and remember features of things we see (for example we describe objects we see out loud and verify them with one another as we���re seeing them).  i went inside to write down this description immediately thereafter.
content.summary: 5 amber lights traveling east over oxford oh

content.detailedDescription: Basically i was riding my bike and was in clarendon hills and it was about 8:20pm and i had my mp3 player with my headphones on with music playing and i was about to go under the route 83 street when i glanced up and saw a light and something moving and wondered if it was a helicopter which i realize now i would of heard a helicopter even with headphones on. but after i got out from under route 83 now in the clarendon hills swimming pool parking lot i looked up and saw this thing hovering not far away. since i didn't have my iphone to record it i just kept moving along on my bike never getting off while glancing up at it at the same time. i totally was not afraid at all. it could of been 8 or 10 stories high the size of one of those recycle bins. it was a darkish greyish color but as i was studying it i could see a hint of red. i think the light was at the bottom of the thing but now i don't remember the light as bright or obvious like when i first saw it and looked up. i think it was a red light i saw for sure when i first looked up before going under the route 83 street. it was hovering and bouncing around but totally staying in the same spot and i think it could sometimes move a little to the left or right or wiggle around. but what i totally remember for sure is that it was really moving around a lot bouncing around. it would do a bounce. it looked too low to be a chineese lantern and too high to be a remote control toy. and who in the world would put something almost directly above route 83. it was basically by route 83 close to the clarendon hills swimming pool and bsnf railroad tracks and again i was riding my bike through the parking lot as i kept glancing up at it. i dont know why i didn't get off my bike maybe cause i was upset i didn't have my iphone. when i got over a block away from it i glanced back and could see it bouncing around in the same spot. i wasn't afraid at all. i felt normal like it was just the oddest thing. actually i felt excited too because i thought about ufo write away. i really think though that if i would of stopped and watched it i would of felt more afraid. but if i would of had my iphone on me i would of recorded it. if i was to see it again i know i would be able to rule in or rule out chineese sky lantern.
content.summary: Round, dark circle hovering and bouncing about 8 stories high and had a light

content.detailedDescription:
I had just exited my front door and happened to look up over the water on the gulf side of the island.

i bright, colorful sphere, that appeared to be made of rotating round edged squares pulsated and looped around a center red dot. at first i thought was probably a helicopter, but it made absolutely no sound and i was certainly close enough to have heard it. it did not have aviation lights.

the object (orb) at first just hovered. the squares that rotated around the center were a combination of red, yellow-orange and yellow and just rotated around a center red dot in a manner to give the object a spherical appearance. after approximately 30 seconds it began to slowly move to the northwest and increase it's altitude.

after approximately another 45 seconds it briefly glowed brighter and then just faded out of what i would call existence.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing multicolor sphere hovered, turned, then blinked away.

content.detailedDescription: Was sit at computer first saw object out window went to investagate also grab my son so i wasnt only one seeing this craft appeared to be circler wwith glowing yellow all over it.
content.summary: Bright yellow circle with glowing yellow all over it

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was in the kitchen getting a glass of water looking out the small window upstairs over my sink at 10 to 11pm.  an extra bright, larger than a star light caught my attention about 2-3 miles away to the left ore or less over tarpon springs, fl.  it seemed to be headed in my direction.  i thought it might be a helicopter but it was traveling very slow and made no noise. as it got closer it seemed to be headed over my 2 story house toward the window where i was standing. it seemed to be very close when the light stopped moving for a few seconds, as i gazed at this event the light went out or vanished.  

the light was slowly heading se, stopped for a few seconds in front of me, over my window then turned off its light(s).
content.summary: He light was slowly heading se, stopped for a few seconds in front of me, over my window then turned off its light(s).

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back yard with my dog at about 10:40 p.M. on august 1, 2013.  i was facing the western sky and usually stargaze because of the excellent view from that vantage point.  while walking west i observed about 8 star-like, yellowish-white objects with blinking or flashing orange auras on top.  these objects were in a semi-circular formation, high in the sky, with two or three of them hanging lower, right above the tree line.  the objects seemed to be hanging in the sky for a short time, and then slowly started traveling east toward our home.  i called out to my boyfriend through the screen door; he also observed the objects, although by that time, did not see as many because the unusual, lighted objects started to drift farther apart as they came closer to us.  we were mystified as to what the flying objects were, and became excited and curious.  we reasoned together and then ruled out all known aircraft.  the objects were flying at about the same altitude as a helicopter would travel, with flashing orange auras on top.  there were absolutely no discernible sounds coming from the mysterious aircraft.  my boyfriend managed to snap a few pictures of them with his cellphone as they flew over our house, but for some reason the images appear blurry and do not do much justice to what we were witnessing.  the strange objects continued traveling east and began to disappear, one by one, getting smaller while going straight up at a high rate of speed.  the objects would appear smaller and smaller and emit a small red flash right before disappearing into the night sky.  a few objects traveled into the eastern sky and became small before vanishing with a tiny red flash.  the whole incident was over in less than five minutes.  i went indoors and called my daughter, and asked her to comb the internet to see if anyone else saw anything.  i was searching the internet today (8/2/2013) and found your site, so i decided to note my observations.
content.summary: Saw 6 to 8 star-like objects; yellowish white with flashing orange lights appearing around  the top of the flying orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was setting in a chair watching planes going to baltimore washington airport with a 10 by 50 binoculars i was facing east,i then notice a black object flying at the same speed of the plane near the front but high above the plane,it follow the plane for about 20 secondary the plane then made turn towards the west at the same time the object went straight up into the clouds i thought the object was a black dot on my glasses,but when i took my glasses off there was nothing on my glasses
content.summary: A plane was going south towards.Baltimore washington airport,i notice there was a black object near the front end of the plane but above the. front end  traveling at the same e speed when the plane started to turn west the object went straight up into the

content.detailedDescription:
I fell asleep in my room. i didn't write down the exact date later. my window was open, no screen.
all the sudden, i woke slightly, only remembering being pulled out of my window, and down the pacific-electric trail. i felt something holding me my under my arms, but nothing was there. i was immobilized. i was positioned upright. 
i kept falling in and out of consciousness. i was being pulled down the trail slowly, then gained incredible speed. no one was on the path, but apparently someone was coming towards us because i then was swept up quickly. i don't remember anything after that until i woke on a metal table.
my arms, feet and head were all held against the table with some type of nerve device.
it's hard to describe, but my outer wrists were pressed against a small plate which would not allow me to move. it was something that tapped into my nerves and sent signals to my brain, which wouldn't allow me to move. i remember squirming a lot, with my head and my temples were getting sore.
i kept waking and falling back asleep.
they tried to keep me out, but i'm stubborn. i kept waking up. 
i saw a couple of your typical looking aliens off to the side of me, about 15 feet away. they were looking at each other, then back at me.
i couldn't tell if they were doctors or nurses. they were short, around 5', with large, dark eyes.
i fell asleep again.
next thing, i'm sitting in a chair and there's an alien sitting across from me. 
she was talking to me, but not verbally.
she was tapped into my thoughts, and therefore i was tapped into hers.
she kept thinking, "you're ok. we're not going to hurt you. we're all done now. your'e fine." i felt like she was very compassionate and kind.
as she was thinking this, i could see into her mind and i knew they could hear her thoughts in the mother ship, above us so she had to be careful what she said to me. she seemed intimidated.
i got the feeling i had been in one of their ships before...That this was like a "follow-up".
i felt as though something was put in or taken out of my stomach.
i could see the mother ship (above us) and the medical ship (we were in, but much smaller) in her head. we were hovering, all lights out on the outside, slightly above the tree line.
she was considered a peon worker, even though she was a nurse.
she had bug-like features, with fillers to the right and left of her head. her skin was the texture of a snake, but all grey. she didn't have abnormally large eyes, just medium, but larger than mine.
she was part human, from what i could see in her mind.
i got a great look at the exterior of the ships and they were shaped like scarab beatles (oval, with a oval section on the top of each). so, maybe the egyptians didn't love the actual scarab beatle. maybe they had seen ships shaped like the ones i saw.
next, i passed out and woke up and was instructed, in my head-no one was there to go inside this large, bright room. there were other humans in there, all between 45-55, which i thought was odd. 
i was told to go to an area that had two liquids (one blue and the other orange), which i was to mix together and drink. i had scarring from struggling on the table...It was really bad on both sides of my temples.
i drank the liquid and could not stop. i was craving it. the liquid was to wipe out our memory and heal our wounds. the combination worked quickly.
i said to the people around me, "i was abducted. were you also?" they looked at me like i was crazy and said, "no, they hadn't been."
i could tell they had already forgotten.
next thing, i woke up in my bed. my arms were crossed over my chest, like a mummy, and i had pillows on either side my head.
i never sleep like that.
i woke up and it was all so real.
the next day, i searched the computer to see if there had been any ufo sightings in my area and there had been.
i told my kids about it, but was embarrassed to talk to anyone else.
it felt so real, but maybe it wasn't. 
i must sound nuts.
i wanted to see if i can be hypnotized and find out if it really happened to me.
i'm not a crazy person.
i'm pretty boring and normal.
i could have someone sketch what she looked like, but if you hypnotize me it may have more detail than what i can recall at this time.
content.summary: Larger (mother craft) above the craft i was in, which was below.

content.detailedDescription:
We were hunting pheasants in a cut corn field at kentland indiana. we were laying on the ground on our backs with out shot guns over our chests.
all of a sudden i looked up and yelled to the other guys that they should look up and we were looking at the 3 discs moving very slow. one of the guys shot at it with his shot gun. after that we dont remember anything but for the lost time we woke up and our shot guns were off to our sides and we dont remember what happened. the discs took off north at a high speed after that. there were 5 of us and we all got some kind of cancer.
my four other friends died from cancer early on, and i was the only one to survive. my cancer is in remission. i cant tell you if we were taken into one of those ships or not. i dont recall. its like lost time, and cant account for it.
colonel gerald kacal, ret
content.summary: There were 3 discs above us.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, i was visiting the evergreen aviation and space museum in mcminnvile, oregon and i have a couple of pictures i would like you to take a look at.  look at the pickup in the background in picture one, and then where it is in picture two, the pictures were taken about 2 seconds apart and i did not see any aircraft flying in the area the entire time i was there.
 
but picture two clearly has an object in the upper middle.  i heard nothing but highway traffic no airplanes or helicopters and did not hear anything from the object.  i noticed the object later looking at the photo and thought that is a ufo.
 
just want to know what the object is in photo two and how it seemed to just appear.  i did not see the object when i took the photo.
 
thanks for looking,
content.summary: Have object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
There was some odd stuff in daytona beach on august 1, 2013. twice yesterday afternoon, with no keys in the ignition, my car's dashboard lit up briefly and then went out.  and then last night at approx. 11:15 pm, the power went out for 1-2 hours from ormond beach to new smyrna beach along the coast.  the news reported this morning that there was no explanation. during the outage, i saw bright red trails in my back yard for an instant.  i assumed that perhaps it was a smoke alarm reflection in the window, but after experimenting, i confirmed that it wasn't a reflection.  anyway, could be nothing but my intuition tells me otherwise.  

in hindsight, i did see a strange light in the sky last week while standing in my driveway, thought it was a lone cloud, but it abrupty disappeared after maybe 3-5 seconds.  the sky was very clear at the time.  if i'm not the only person reporting anything in this vicinity, i would like to know.  thank you
content.summary: Appeared very quickly, cloud like, then disappeared.  no cloud cover that evening at all.

content.detailedDescription:
Recently, while i was reviewing photos of my family's trip to niagara falls several years ago, i noticed a ufo-like light. it says very close to the skylon tower on the canadian side of niagara falls for a duration of 32 minutes and 22 seconds (at least, that's the time between our first photo of it and our last - it very well could have been there longer). it seems to vary in its distance from the tower, but never strays very far from its original spot. it's clearly visible even during the fireworks display as a different entity. neither myself nor my parents recall seeing the anomaly in person, but it can't have just been caused by the camera due to the changes in both its and our position. it changes from pure white to a light yellow color. sometimes appears to be just a small, round ball and other times like a check mark. in one image, it even seems to have a blue "aura" around it.

please note that the first 4 images are very large samples - the fifth image is a compilation of those, plus numerous others. the tower is included as a reference for distance. also note that the timestamps are not accurate, but have been included on the compilation for duration measuring purposes (the duration should be correct, it is only the time that's not because my parents forgot to set it). also note that before the images where the sky is dark, we were approaching the area.
content.summary: On vacation. bright, hovering object in same general area for about 32 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: It was shaking dissapeiring reappearing we were walking home i noticed it i was awstruct it dissapeired
content.summary: Weird.

content.detailedDescription:
I was babysitting for my neighbor - two 9-year-olds and a 13-year-old (i'm 18). we were playing wii, and we heard someone shout, "hey!" from outside - it sounded exactly like my neighbor. at the same time, the computer in the room shut itself off and the tv flickered. we figured that the adults had arrived home, but when we went to the window, there was nothing outside except for this strange shadow. it looked like it might be a person, but it didn't move. we waved at it, and it started emitting this red-orange sort of linear light - almost like a sparkler, but the light pulsated. we started to panic, and i called the person whose voice we thought we heard and told him what was going on. when i went back to the window, the light was gone, but the shadow was still there.  the adults arrived 15 minutes later, and we told them what had happened. when i went outside to go home, i noticed a dark spot on the driveway, like what happens if you splash water on a spot, but it was too dark to really make anything out. we all really think it was some kind of strange alien that copied the voice of the person we thought we heard somehow, and we were all scared for our lives. i know at least one of the other witnesses had a nightmare from it - it was really unnerving. even the two pet dogs at the house with us were acting very strange, jumping up on the couch and panting heavily even though it wasn't hot outside.
i had taken several photos of the light, but they've disappeared, despite other pictures i took that night being unneffected.
content.summary: Confusing - may not have been ufo, but no real explanation.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on the couch in my living room. the only lights in the room that were on was a tiny red dot on my blu-ray player, a tiny red dot on my tv (indicating they were off), and off in the kitchen, our microwave was displaying the time. i was facing away from the window when i saw a bright green light fill the room. i looked out the window behind me, but there was no source of the light. behind my house about 100 feet away is our town hall, and there was one white street light on, and nothing else. i proceeded to look around the room for any source of the light, and as i turned back to the window, the light disappeared. although the incident only 60-90 seconds (i estimate about 75), when i looked back at the time, it was a good 15 minutes later than when i had just looked around the room. i suddenly felt very tired, and proceeded to fall asleep. i haven't experienced such a thing since.
content.summary: Saw bright green light from outside window, but no source anywhere in sight. lasted between 1-1.5 minutes, but lost time.

content.detailedDescription: We were on a boat at inland lake stargazing.  i was looking in a southerly direction at an elevation of approximately 45-50 degrees.  i saw what appeared to be a single rotation of a very bright white light.  it flashed/rotated once, and then about 30 seconds later i saw it again just marginally down and to the left of its original location.  it reminded me of what one might see if you were to observe a lighthouse from a great distance or the rotating beacon at an airport, except that the light was quite bright and it exhibited only a singe rotation.  while i have no way of verifying the height of the object, my impression was that it was very, very high in the sky.  it appeared to be a very bright, powerful beacon of light (brighter than the visible stars around it) but there was no ambient light observed around me that would have been given off by the object.
content.summary: Two rotating beacons of light

content.detailedDescription: I was at home @ 39 catherine street. the above address. i have a set of night optic's gen 3 auto-gated night vision goggles. that evening , i received a 5x magnification lens ( viewing distance is 1.5 to 3 miles ), in which i adapted to my nv goggles. i also have a greem (532nm) laser pointer with a beam distance of over 30 miles. also a night optics k-2 infared adapter with adjustable beam. from 11:00 p.M. on tuesday july 30th to $;00 a.M. july 31st; i observed 2 craft descend west of east northport in the town of greenvale, to the ground. one hovered, while the second landed. the 2 were in those positions for about an hour. i think someone got a visit or was abducted. using my laser , i was signalling the hovering disc-shaped craft. it would rise up above the tree line , flash a few lights at me ; signaling they knew, i'm there and they acknowledge my observation. then descend again. during the interim , i scanned the night sky ; 360 degree's. then i observed at various distances other type craft. i was astonished at the enormity and the size of the submarine shaped craft. it looked like they had conning towers attached; like one would see on an aircraft carrier ! in a 270 degree view, i lost count after 152 vehicles... i was signaling various moving craft with 1st my infared and when they suddenly stopped , i shined my laser on them. they returned with various flashes of bright white and yellow lights. each craft flashed in different sequences. to finish my statement ; at 4:00a.M. i was observing a large submarine shaped ship which was very bright. white almost opaque in color; directing a red beam at 2 -3 shaped disc's; that seamed to be exiting a similar sub. parallel to the one with the red beam. the location was east. at this point i was tired . i concentrated my thoughts: stating i'm going in the house and i'll be out here tomorrow night. i was projecting my thought pattern to the lead craft in the sky. i said ; flash your lights once or twice if you understand. at this point, out of the dark night sky came 2 bright white flashes. i waved to all above and went inside the house. the next night, there was less of them but they were there !
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cigar,   Chevron,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Other
content.summary: I observed through gen 3 night vision goggles over 158 submarine shaped with conning towers in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Outside at my sister in law home smoking.
i noticed the object while looking for an usual commercial airplane altitude. when i turned my head toward the east, i saw this enormous objects.
when i first saw it i was astonished cause of the size. it was hovering horizontally in the sky. i told my sister to come check it out and the object was vertical at that point.
when i saw it i had no doubt in my mind that it was a ufo. it was hovering, it was as big as a skyscraper, had 3 bright light that allowed me to make out the color,metallic silver.
it was approximately between 4 -5 am
as soon as i noticed it was sitting horizontally on the eastern sky of oklahoma, i called my sister in law cause i wanted her to see it. i looked and the object was vertical at that point.
before she could get a good look of it, this " mountain" flew up at a speed none of our aircraft could even come close to attempt, due to the monumental size of this object, i still can't believe what i saw last night. i never ever seen anything that can even come close to it. it was enormous ! it was cigar shaped but rounded on one side, and i don't understand how something so big could disappear in matter of seconds!!!
content.summary: Cigar shape, as big as one of the twin towers, first the object was horizontal then vertical with 3 huge lights. when the light were pulsating i could see a distinct metallic grey color. this thing was humongous!
